data.message: My nephew Michael Kirman was like a son to me and I'm not sure how else to get a message thru to Eminem but you were basically his hero your music made him the strong young man he became..sadly on April 17th this year he went to the river with friends and drowned.. he had depression and anxiety but Eminems music changed his life and I just wanted to say thank you for helping him cope with life you and his girlfriend were his world..
